NAME
  ubertooth-dfu - write firmware to device

SYNOPSIS
  ubertooth-dfu <command> <arguments>

DESCRIPTION


OPTIONS

  --write <application firmware filename>   Write a file to application flash region
  --read <filename>  Read data from application flash region and write to a file
  --sign <binary firmware filename>  Add DFU signature to firmware file
  --detach  Detach the bootloader and execute the application firmware

AUTHOR
  This manual page was written by Ruben Undheim <ruben.undheim@gmail.com> for the Debian project (and may be used by others).
